channel.title: hip_microscope on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in hip_microscope on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hyperspectral Exploration
item.description: Hyperspectral datasets from confocal microscopes or other spectral imaging systems (CL etc) need technqiues to reduce these 3D datasets into interpretable 2D information. This workflow takes data hyperspectral PL or Raman maps from the hip_microscope, allows for interactive exploration of the data, and provides interactive Principal Component Analysis routines.
